text: Does It Pay? is a lostThe Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: Does It Pay? 1923 American silent society drama film directed by Charles Horan and starring Hope Hampton. It was produced and distributed by Fox Film Corporation.Progressive Silent Film List: Does It Pay? at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films: Does It Pay? ==Cast== *Hope Hampton as Doris Clark *Robert T. Haines as John Weston *Florence Short as Martha Weston *Walter Petri as Jack Weston *Peggy Shaw as Alice Weston *Charles Wellesley as Senator Delafield *Mary Thurman as Marion *Claude Brooke as Attorney Alden *Pierre Gendron as Harold Reed *Roland Bottomley as Francois Chavelle *Marie Shotwell as Mrs. Clark *Ben Grauer as The Boy ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1923 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Fox Film films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1923 drama films
title: Does It Pay?
